channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Janelle Monáe’s Wondaween 2025 Will Throw a Vampire Beach Music Fest in Los Angeles
item.description: 🦇🎶 Sink your teeth into this news! @JanelleMonae is bringing a Vampire Beach Music Fest to LA for Wondaween 2025! 🏖️ #Wondaween #MusicFestival

item.title: Tour news: No Doubt, Kiki Bashi, Cheekface, Rural Alberta Advantage, Matt Pryor (Get Up Kids), more
item.description: 🎶 Exciting lineup ahead! Which show are you most stoked for? Let's dance our way through this tour news! 💃🎉 #livemusic #tourannouncement

item.title: Sabrina Carpenter Takes a Bite Out of the Big Apple in ‘Sex and the City’-Inspired ‘SNL’ Promo
item.description: 🍎 Sabrina Carpenter struts through NYC in 'Sex and the City'-inspired 'SNL' promo! Can't wait for this fierce performance! 🔥 #NYCvibes

item.title: Poppy Unveils Reimagined Version of Wham’s “Last Christmas”: Stream
item.description: 🎄 Poppy sprinkles some festive magic with her twist on Wham's "Last Christmas"! 🎶✨ Listen now! #Poppy #LastChristmas #NewMusic

item.title: Sugar Announce Reunion Tour, Release First New Music in 30 Years
item.description: 🎉 Sugar is back and better than ever! 🎶 Catch them live on tour and listen to their new grooves now! #SugarReunionTour 🎸
